fastload.button.debug.tooltip: Should debugs be printed in the logs?
fastload.button.force_close.tooltip: Should fastload close the DownloadingTerrainScreen earlier, even if it's slightly unsafe?
fastload.button.pre_render.tooltip: Many many chunks in a radius should be prepared and built during pre-rendering? Limited by render distance
fastload.button.gen_radius.tooltip: Many many chunks in a radius should be generated on the server until completed. Should inversely correlate with pre-render radius for optimal performance
fastload.button.try_limit.tooltip: How many times should the same chunk count be return in a row before bailing on pre-rendering
